name: Racing [2006]
description:
Simple endless runner inspired by brick-games created for Liga24 #1 compo from GMCLAN.ORG.

Graphics made by me, sounds recorded from a generic brick game.

Made in 2006 in Game Maker 6.1. Converted in 2017 to Game Maker Studio and rebuilt into HTML5. Unfortunately, some functionalities connected were missing, so I had to make simple workarounds (alerts and score in top left corner).
